title: LiDAR Innovations in Home Assessments
excerpt: LiDAR technology is revolutionizing home assessments by providing fast, high-precision 3D scans of interior spaces. Inspectors and contractors can now capture accurate layouts, detect structural issues, and plan renovations with greater efficiency. It's a powerful tool that enhances both safety evaluations and design planning, all without the need for invasive measurements.

title: Designing for Dignity: Accessible Remodels
excerpt: Creating a home that supports independence starts with thoughtful design. From wider doorways to zero-step entries, accessible remodels enhance mobility without compromising style. These upgrades prioritize comfort, safety, and dignity, empowering residents to live confidently in their own space.
